T02D3500:151b-1: dha na d'a na t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3500:151b-3: sgrol ma nor sbyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3500:151b-4: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3500:151b-5: sgrol ma ljang gu zhal gcig ma //
T02D3500:151b-6: phyag bzhi spyan gnyis khyod mnyes phyir //
T02D3500:152a-2: bcom ldan 'phags ma sgrol ma yi //
T02D3500:152a-3: khyad 'phags shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02D3500:152a-4: nor sbyin rim pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3500:152a-5: bsdus nas bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D3500:152a-6: rnal 'byor pas snga bar byang chub tu sems bskyed
T02D3500:152a-7: nas rang gi snying gar zla ba la t'am yig
T02D3500:152a-8: ljang gu bltas la kha bsang ba la sogs pa
T02D3500:152a-9: bya'o // aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sv'a
T02D3500:152a-10: bh'a ba shuddho& ham zhes brjod nas aom aa mri
T02D3500:152a-11: bya'o // te h'um phat / ces pa 'dis se gol gyis phyogs bcur bgegs bskrad nas /
T02D3500:152a-12: rang gi snying gar pam yig las skyes pa'i chu
T02D3500:152a-13: skyes dmar po'i steng du aa yig las skyes pa'i
T02D3500:152a-14: zla ba la gnas pa'i rang gi sa bon bsgoms
T02D3500:152a-15: nas / de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs
T02D3500:152a-16: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan drangs nas
T02D3500:152a-17: mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs te yang dag par
T02D3500:152a-18: nas / mchod nas / sdig pa bshags pa la
T02D3500:152a-19: sogs pa bya zhing stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas
T02D3500:152a-21: ram yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3500:152a-22: nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig nag po las
T02D3500:152a-23: skyes pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bltas nas
T02D3500:152a-24: / de'i 'od zer gyis rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
T02D3500:152a-26: rdo rje'i sa gzhi yang bsam par bya'o //
T02D3500:152a-27: de nas sna tshogs rdo rje'i stegs bu pa bam
T02D3500:152a-28: yig dmar po las skyes pa'i chu skyes kyi steng
T02D3500:152a-29: du aa yig las zla ba la gnas pa'i bhr'um
T02D3500:152a-30: yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo
T02D3500:152a-31: dkar po'o // bhr'um yig dbus su bltas la padma dang zla ba dang /
T02D3500:152a-32: nyi ma'i sa bon yongs su gyur pa las skyes
T02D3500:152a-33: pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin gru
T02D3500:152a-34: bzhi la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i 'khor
T02D3500:152a-35: lo gnyis so // snying po'i 'khor lo la gnas
T02D3500:152a-36: pa'i chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa'i ze'u 'bru la
T02D3500:152a-37: zla ba dgus nye bar mdzes pa sgo bzhi la
T02D3500:152a-38: gnas pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
T02D3500:152a-40: de nas dbus su zla ba'i steng du de bzhin du t'am yig go //
T02D3500:152a-41: de la spro ba dang bsdu ba bya'o //
T02D3500:152a-42: de nas de'i sa bon las bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol mar bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3500:152a-43: zla ba'i gdan la zhi ba'i 'od dang ldan zhing
T02D3500:152a-44: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa sku mdog ljang
T02D3500:152b-5: gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D3500:152b-6: de nas aom ni spyi bo ru'o //
T02D3500:152b-15: h'a ni rkang pa dag la dgod par bya'o //
T02D3500:152b-16: de nas snying gar padma dang zla ba la gnas
T02D3500:152b-17: pa'i rang gi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bskul
T02D3500:152b-18: nas spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis
T02D3500:152b-19: bdag la dbang bskur zhing don yod grub pas dbu
T02D3500:152b-21: / yang na snying po la gnas pa'i zla ba
T02D3500:152b-22: la rdo rje sgrol ma la sogs pa'i lha mo
T02D3500:152b-23: rnams skad cig gis bltas te /
T02D3500:152b-24: phyi nas bsgom par bya ste /
T02D3500:152b-25: shar du rdo rje sgrol ma ste //
T02D3500:152b-26: nag mo phyag na rdo rje bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-27: lho ru rin chen sgrol ma ste //
T02D3500:152b-28: ser mo phyag na rin chen bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-29: nub tu padma'i sgrol ma ste ;
T02D3500:152b-30: / dmar mo phyag na chu skyes bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-31: byang du sangs rgyas sgrol ma ste //
T02D3500:152b-32: dkar mo phyag na 'khor lo bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-33: me mtshams me tog sgrol ma ste //
T02D3500:152b-34: dkar mo me tog phreng ba bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-35: bdug spos sgrol ma bden bral du //
T02D3500:152b-36: nag mo spos por phyag na bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-37: rlung mtshams mar me'i sgrol ma ste //
T02D3500:152b-38: ser mo mar me'i sdong bu bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-39: dri yi sgrol ma dbang ldan mtshams //
T02D3500:152b-40: dmar mo dri yi dung chos bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-42: zla brgyad la gnas zla ba'i 'od //
T02D3500:152b-43: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs shing //
T02D3500:152b-44: phyag g-yon na ni autpal bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-45: zhal ni 'dzum zhing sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D3500:152b-46: rgyan dang gos rnams 'chang ba po //
T02D3500:152b-47: shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma //
T02D3500:152b-48: nag mo rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag //
T02D3500:152b-49: lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ma //
T02D3500:152b-50: ser mo rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma //
T02D3500:152b-51: dmar mor rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams //
T02D3500:152b-52: byang du rdo rje dril bu ma //
T02D3500:152b-53: dkar mo rdo rje dril bu'i phyag /'di rnams bsgo
T02D3500:152b-54: bzhi la nyi ma la blta zhing nyi ma'i 'od
T02D3500:152b-55: dang ldan pa ral pa dmar ser gyi gyen du
T02D3500:152b-56: brdzes pa / zhabs g-yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3500:152b-57: sbrul gya rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D3500:153a-0: zhal 'jigs pa stag gi pags pa'i na bza' bsnams @153a * //
T02D3500:153a-2: phyag g-yon pas autpal bsnams pa'o //
T02D3500:153a-3: de nas ye shes sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu
T02D3500:153a-4: byas te yid mi g-yo ba'i rang gi sa bon
T02D3500:153a-5: shin tu phra mo'i bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3500:153a-6: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3500:153a-7: aom t'a ra tutt'a re tu re dh'a nam me da da sv'a h'a /
T02D3500:153a-8: de nas langs te dam tshig la aom aa k'a
T02D3500:153a-9: ro mu kham zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyis
T02D3500:153a-10: autpa la'i phyag rgyas gtor ma phul nas smon lam
T02D3500:153a-11: gdab par bya'o // lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rang
T02D3500:153a-12: gi sa bon gyi nang du bsgoms nas rang lha'i
T02D3500:153a-13: nga rgyal byas nas ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02D3500:153a-14: nyi ma'i gung dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams dag la
T02D3500:153a-15: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las skad cig gis
T02D3500:153a-16: lha rnams kyi 'khor lo sngon ma bzhin du spros
T02D3500:153a-17: te bsgoms nas bzlas pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3500:153a-18: phyi dro dang nyi ma gung thun la yang khyad par 'di'o //
T02D3500:153a-19: me tog la sogs pas ye shes pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3500:153a-20: yang dag par mchod nas aom t'a re tutt'a re
T02D3500:153a-21: tu re mu: zhes pa 'dis gshegs su gsol lo
